prefix.notEnoughtArgs:
Please specify the prefix as first argument!
You can put it in brackets if it contains spaces!
Sample: `$prefixprefix "$prefix"`
prefix.toManyArgs:
Please only add one argument!
You can use brackets if you need spaces in your prefix!
Sample: `$prefixprefix "$prefix"`
